website_summaries.verdict: A universal solution to accent turn signals, brighten brake lights, illuminate license plates, and much more.
pros: This kit is compatible on all vehicles with a 12-volt outlet
Bright LED lights are waterproof, temperature resistant, and easy to clean
Can be installed inside your vehicle or on the exterior, with endless aesthetic and practical applications
cons: Adhesive will lose strength over time if exposed to the elements

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just the size I was looking for. The wires are small but plenty of length to work with. I have an older car with no daytime running lights. Not anymore! Nice and bright, adding an excellent look to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three pair of LED lights and these are the best so far they’re bright they’re durable and flexible
customer_reviews.author: Christopher clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and look pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: There's a good feel and look to this product. It can also expand or stretch a bit to fit your car. I can't comment on durability since I have not installed them yet, but I did connect them to a battery terminal to make sure that they work. I will say that I find them not to be very bright compared to the ones my Mercedes Benz or other vehicles I see on the road. Nevertheless I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a set of lights to enhance their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: HMH

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Well... I liked the material they are buil and the flexibility plus the easy way to work with them making a shape. I expected brighter LEDS tho. But for its price, they are ok. Recommendations: Use a hard cold glue to avoid they fall off. 3M might loose the strength throughout the time, water, shaking and many other factors.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Super LED lights
customer_reviews.text: These things are super bright. Excellent buy. Received them in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: terryfoster2u

customer_reviews.title: Bright and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The flexible pad makes it very easy to mount on odd shapes. I mounted mine on the rounded corners (front & back) to give me a little more light when navigating thru dark narrow rv parks.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Self adhesive tape plus screws made a secure mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Wires were very thin and flimsy. Difficult to make a good connection. Also very short so had to be joined just to join the lights together, before connecting to power.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Work well for a little time
customer_reviews.text: Product works well for a lil then starts to flicker and stop working. Wish they were better quality because wen they work they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for. They are very visible however they scatter the light so you will not notice when they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon hinds

customer_reviews.title: If you want some bright permanent light by these
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on tilt trailers from picking up equipment from job sites they work well extremely bright
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Brite leds
customer_reviews.text: These leds are excellent i put a pair on my lawn mower and another on my truck
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Larger than stated not as bright
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I had hoped but work great because of their flexibility. They ARE considerably larger than expected
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: They're OK...but you get what you pay for, right?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cool white light but overall quality wasn't not up to my standards, so I changed them out with a better more expensive set. Like I said...you get what you pay for but honestly, the product is well worth the money. These D.R.L.'s are a great bargain for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Hill

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install great value !!!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised very bright . Use for running lights on my Jeep Wrangler unlimited .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bright enough for daylight running. Not as bright as fog lights. Love them. They do the job that they were designed for.
customer_reviews.author: LloydieC

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Lights started going out after 6 months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT SPECS ARE WRONG
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I needed a specific length. The product description said it was 6 inches. I received the product today and I can assure you it is not 6 inches. It is almost 9 inches and will not fit the area I have for them. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: they are just bright enough for my Bronco. I used them as running lights. Installed above my bumper. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Billy A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Well they are bright but they are kind of cheesy but they work
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of install 2 Led’s burnout already on one of the lights. Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: HarryMan

customer_reviews.title: it's nice to order some things and get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for and at a good price
customer_reviews.author: jesse B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I should of know better but this was a impulse purchase. Not bright, and the wiring is very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Won't be buying this again
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year before lights started burning out
customer_reviews.author: JAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lights make the car different then anyone else who has the same type of car.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: VERY COOL
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for backup lights on the Polaris utv I use.
customer_reviews.author: BETTY B

customer_reviews.title: I have not installed yet, they seem a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not installed yet, they seem a little long for my application. I think I can modify to fit.
customer_reviews.author:
LOUBEAAmazon Custo



LOUBEA

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't install theses until June and by August it looks like I have a turn signal on. So in (3) MONTHS they have failed to work.
customer_reviews.author: David G Sovik

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: They lasted about 3 weeks before they started going out, one diode at a time. they are flickering most of the time. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than they appear
customer_reviews.text: Not bright enough, Adhesion is not great, and lights too small to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbbbbb

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs burn out in random spots
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs burned out after about a week of installing them. Bought another set and the same thing happened again. Very disappointed....would have appreciated a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it was expandable so it can cover a wider area. I installed them as fog lights on my VW Passatt SE.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy install and could not be happier with how bright they are...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Product isn't worth buying. Only a few of the LEDs lit up not only for one strip but both had defects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works good..bright and easy to install...did myself...put them on bottom of my headlights..blend in...I bought two pair but one pair was defective on one side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EEEKit Daytime Running Light, 9 LED DC 12V 4.5W Driving Daylight Fog Waterproof Dustproof Light with Adhesive Tape, 2 Pack, White
product_meta.description:
Package Includes: 2 x Day Running Lights, 4 x Screws
Please note that EEEKit and Amazon.com are the only sellers on Amazon that are authorized to sell products with the EEEKit name. Buy from sellers EEEKit or Amazon.com to ensure authenticity and better service.

Product Description:

 Super bright 9 white LED high power increase safety when driving at night for use as rear or front warning lamps. Can be applied as day running light, fog light, brake light, backup light, decoration light, license plate light, door light, chassis lamp, etc. Universal for all 12V vehicles.

Specification

 Type: 9-LED Day Running Light
Dimension: 9.45*0.79*0.59in (240*20*15mm)
Maximum extended length: 12in (310mm)
Weight: 1.6oz (46g/pc) Power: 0.5W/pc Voltage: DC 12V LED color: white Application range: day running light, fog light, brake light, backup light, decoration light, license plate light, door light, chassis lamp, etc.

Features 

 High quality Daytime Running Light with no pollution, no noise, no electronic interference.
9 LED, 0.5W/LED, super bright.
Durable high temperature, shakeproof, dustproof, waterproof and corrosion resistant.
Highly efficient, energy saving and long life span.
Bendable and extendable.
Comes with adhesive backing and screws, red wire to positive and black to negative, easy to install.
Can be applied as day running light, fog light, brake light, backup light, decoration light, license plate light, door light, chassis lamp, etc. Universal for all 12V vehicles.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT SPECIFICATION: It designs with 9LED, such super bright. Length: 240mm, Width: 20mm, Thickness: 15mm, 4.5W/piece. Fit for all 12V vehicles.
DURABLE MATERIAL: Durable Material: Made of ABS, it is resistant to high temperatures, waterproof, dustproof and corrosion.
FLEXIBLE DESIGN: It can be bent. it is flexible to bent the shape as you like. Each LED is independent, if you want to extend, you can cut off the adhesive tape.
EASY TO INSTALL: Come with 3M tape on the back, can be curved to install. You only need to change the line connection and installation location. car interior or exterior.
WHAT YOU GET: The package comes with 2 pieces Day running light bulbs and 4 screws. If any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will solve for you.
